title: Instructional Design Strategies for LMS-Based Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance self-directed learning abilities and science concept comprehension through LMS-integrated learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, requiring a formative assessment-centered feedback system.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and implement weekly learning plans using LMS features
Learners participate in science inquiry activities including peer evaluation on LMS discussion boards at least 80% of the time
Learners achieve at least 75% accuracy rates in formative assessments through the LMS quiz system
Learners utilize science experiment simulation materials from the LMS resource center at least twice weekly

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
